item.description: Tee time is 1:33 and 1:42. They're running a special. So $44 per person including carts (usually $56). If you don't mind, I'm going to collect an additional $10 from you to help pay for the meetup website fee. If you need to cancel, please call/email me as soon as possible. Thx
item.how_to_find_us: Outside club house or around putting green

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Widow's Walk
